entry.title: Dive into Solar
entry.summary:
Solar power is going to save the world!
No, no, no it is not. Not for some time. But it sure is fun and has been a great learning experience about electricity.

entry.title: Guitar stuff
entry.summary:
I quit my job and decided to become a Rock Star.
So I needed a guitar. Then I needed to learn it.
Ok, so my Rock Star carreer never really took off and it did not happen exactly like that but designing and learning about guitars has been real fun, even

entry.title: Welcome
